main event: On 11 September 1958, bright red lights were observed in the sky near Hopa, Turkey, which broke into clusters and then reappeared as a single object.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 5 minutes and involved multiple series of objects observed at 30-second intervals,The objects hovered only 50-100 feet above the water,The possible explanations for the sighting included balloons, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena,There were reports of unearthly sounds during the sightings,This incident was part of a larger investigation by Project Blue Book.
sighted object: 6-9 bright red lights in the sky
witness description: A USAF officer observing from a surface vessel
